description.0: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

0.0: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <cryo>8%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

1.0: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <cryo>10%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

2.0: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <cryo>12%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

3.0: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <cryo>14%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

4.0: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <cryo>16%</cryo> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.
